root.name: NHL 06
root.description: This installment in the EA series boasts the re introduction of the Create-A-Player feature. It was revamped after the release of Tiger Woods to provide a more authentic creation experience. Tampa Bay player and forward, Vincent Lecavalier is featured on the cover for the North American version of the game. The Nordic version of the game featured Tuomo Ruutu on the cover as a Chicago Blackhawk.SoundtrackAmerican Head Charge - "Loyalty"Animal Alpha - "Bundy"Avenged Sevenfold - "Bat Country"Beatsteaks - "Atomic Love"Billy Talent - "Red Flag"Bullet For My Valentine - "4 Words (To Choke Upon)"Fall Out Boy - "Our Lawyer Made Us Change The Name Of This Song So We Wouldn't Get Sued"Institute - "Bullet-Proof Skin"Kaiser Chiefs - "Saturday Night"Mando Diao - "Down In The Past"OK Go - "Do What You Want"Panic! At the Disco - "I Write Sins Not Tragedies"Pennywise - "Knocked Down"Rock 'N' Roll Soldiers - "Flag Song"
